product_name: Smith Turnkey ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Light, comfortable and well-ventilated, the Smith Turnkey ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses feature a frameless design and lenses that offer outstanding clarity, contrast and a vivid color experience. ChromaPop lenses optimize color and increase clarity, enabling you to see the outside world with an unparalleled level of true colors and vibrance. Polarized glass lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black and Midnight Blue colors feature gray-green tinted lenses, ideal for medium-to-bright light. Dark Brown color features platinum tinted lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. The Smith Turnkey ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses feature a hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends that get tacky when wet for grip during exercise and hot weather. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants.
